modName: A mod of Ice and Fire
summary: This is the official Westeros Project revival mod, the original owner gave me and a few others rights to The Westeros Project and I intend to see this mod continued for \"What is dead may never die\" .
descriptionHtml:
THIS IS A WORK IN PROGRESS

This is a total conversion mod for Skyrim that turns the land of Skyrim into the land of Westeros from the famous George R. R. Martin book series A Song of Ice and Fire.The conversion will include the real map of Westeros ,custom weapons and armor, new characters and a new story.

This mod is in development and we are looking for modders ,so if you are interested in helping in any way please post in our recruiting forum.

Our main page is here , it is updated a bit more but soon I well get a mod team member to manage this nexus page http://www.moddb.com/mods/winter-is-coming-a-mod-of-ice-and-fire

Our mod group is here http://www.moddb.com/company/highlander-studios
author: JedJTL and The Team

files.name: Original Westeros Project files FOR TESTING ONLY
